snippet: The Garry Winogrand retrospective at the Metropolitan Museum offers a montage of midcentury America, from ebullient to sexy to cranky to nascently gluttonous.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews photographs in Garry Winogrand retrospective at Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: The Garry Winogrand retrospective at the Metropolitan Museum offers a montage of midcentury America, from ebullient to sexy to cranky to nascently gluttonous.

headline.seo: ‘Garry Winogrand,’ a Retrospective at the Metropolitan Museum
headline.main: No Moral, No Uplift, Just a Restless ‘Click’
headline.print_headline: No Moral, No Uplift, Just a Restless ‘Click’
